alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Eastern Loudoun; Fairfax; Northwest Prince William; Southern Fauquier; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 3:15AM EST until January 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between a coating to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central Maryland and central and northern Virginia. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as a mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain between 7 and 10 AM, before gradually changing over to rain during the late morning to early afternoon hours. The rain will come to an end during the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
